item.title: Debian 4.9 Config Static Ip.md
item.description: Linux debian 4.9.0-6-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.9.82-1+deb9u3 (2018-03-02) x86_64 kk@debian:~$ cat /etc/network/interfaces # This file describes the network interfaces available on your system # and how to activate them. For more information, see interfaces(5). source /etc/network/interfaces.d/* # The loopback network interface auto lo iface lo inet loopback 修改后 # This file describes the network interfaces available on your system # and how to activate them. For more information,

item.title: iperf 测试网络带宽
item.description: 100BASE-TX iPerf - The ultimate speed test tool for TCP, UDP and SCTP Test the limits of your network + Internet neutrality test 编译安装 iperf windows 端直接下载二进制文件 iPerf 3.1.3 (8 jun 2016 - 1.3 MiB for Windows Vista 64bits to Windows 10 64bits) 嵌入式平台需要从源码[[交叉编

item.title: Virtualbox Opensuse 无网络图标 无法上网
item.description: 参考链接 https://forum.suse.org.cn/t/eth0/2049/4 https://zh.opensuse.org/openSUSE:13.1%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98 Virtualbox 虚拟机装完没有网络？ sudo systemctl start NetworkManager 启动 NetworkManager 服务，会自动运行 DHCP 分配 IP 地址给你。之后可用：ping 127.0.0.1 或 ping 192.168.1.1测试（按 Ctrl +
